releaseNotes: First public alpha release.
Now with custom domain and SSL. Under the hood, switched from redux to react-query. First draft of a mobile-friendly UI.
Masonry layout test.
Masonry layout test.
Added search. Customized breakpoints.
Fixed search bug. Added In Stock, Out of Stock and Unlisted labels. Added versions info.
Improve product list loading view.
Rework product details page.
Add charts!
Add filters for types and tags!
Add lightbox for images!
Add back link to header. Add min/max price display. Show "Unlisted" instead of stock on details page.
Add previous/next links to product details page.
Prefetch previous/next products in product details page. Lazy load images in product list page.
Prefetch previous/next products in product details page. Lazy load images in product list page.
Add feedback link to header. Add new, temporary, favicon.
Beta of newsletter archives at archives.survivor.tools/newsletter
Timeline view for newsletter list.
Beta of Kickstarter archives at archives.survivor.tools/kickstarter
Added scroll to top button to footer. Improvement to KS update display.
Search for KS updates - including text in images!
Filter products by in stock, out of stock and unlisted. Link to shop on product pages.
